body_html:
@fmassa I've added a generic WeightedClassNLLCriterion.c in C and made the necessary definitions in init.c and THNN.h. Can you tell me how I can integrate it back all the way up to nll_loss like _functions.thnn.NLLLoss?

Also, @soumith, can you please add me to the PyTorch Slack?
body_text:
@fmassa I've added a generic WeightedClassNLLCriterion.c in C and made the necessary definitions in init.c and THNN.h. Can you tell me how I can integrate it back all the way up to nll_loss like _functions.thnn.NLLLoss?
Also, @soumith, can you please add me to the PyTorch Slack?
body:
@fmassa I've added a generic `WeightedClassNLLCriterion.c` in C and made the necessary definitions in `init.c` and `THNN.h`. Can you tell me how I can integrate it back all the way up to `nll_loss` like [`_functions.thnn.NLLLoss`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/functional.py#L500)?

Also, @soumith, can you please add me to the PyTorch Slack?
